SEARCH
Package gw.api.financials

Class FinancialsCalculationUtil

java.lang.Object
gw.api.financials.FinancialsCalculationUtil
public class FinancialsCalculationUtil extends Object
Provides instances of FinacialsCalculation that represent a particular Financials calculated amount, such as Available Reserves or Net Total Incurred.

  • Method Details

    • getAvailableReserves

      public static FinancialsCalculation getAvailableReserves()
      Deprecated.
      (since 10.0.1) Please use FinancialsCalculations.getAvailableReserves() instead
      Returns a FinancialsCalculation representing Available Reserves:

      (Submitted reserves + Awaiting Submission reserves for today)
      -
      (Submitted eroding payments + Awaiting Submission eroding payments for today + Future eroding payments + Pending-approval eroding payments).

      Returns:
      FinancialsCalculation representing the defined calculation.

    • getAwaitingSubmissionReserves

      public static FinancialsCalculation getAwaitingSubmissionReserves()
      Deprecated.
      (since 10.0.1) Please use FinancialsCalculations.getAwaitingSubmissionReserves() instead
      Returns a FinancialsCalculation representing Awaiting Submission Reserves:

      (Awaiting Submission reserves for today)

      Returns:
      FinancialsCalculation representing the defined calculation.

    • getOpenReserves

      public static FinancialsCalculation getOpenReserves()
      Deprecated.
      (since 10.0.1) Please use FinancialsCalculations.getOpenReserves() instead
      Returns a FinancialsCalculation representing Open Reserves:

      (Submitted reserves + Awaiting Submission reserves for today)
      -
      (Submitted eroding payments + Awaiting Submission eroding payments for today).

      Returns:
      FinancialsCalculation representing the defined calculation.

    • getRemainingReserves

      public static FinancialsCalculation getRemainingReserves()
      Deprecated.
      (since 10.0.1) Please use FinancialsCalculations.getRemainingReserves() instead
      Returns a FinancialsCalculation representing Remaining Reserves:

      (Submitted reserves + Awaiting Submission reserves for today)
      -
      (Submitted eroding payments + Awaiting Submission eroding payments for today + Future eroding payments).

      Returns:
      FinancialsCalculation representing the defined calculation.

      Deprecated.
      (since 10.0.1) Please use FinancialsCalculations.getTotalReservesIncludingPending() instead
      Returns a FinancialsCalculation representing Total Reserves with Pending:

      Submitted reserves + Awaiting Submission reserves for today + Pending-approval reserves.

      Returns:
      FinancialsCalculation representing the defined calculation.

      Returns:

    • getTotalPaymentsIncludingPending

      public static FinancialsCalculation getTotalPaymentsIncludingPending()
      Deprecated.
      (since 10.0.1) Please use FinancialsCalculations.getTotalPaymentsIncludingPending() instead
      Returns a FinancialsCalculation representing Total Payments with Pending:

      Submitted payments + Awaiting Submission payments for today + Future payments + Pending-approval payments.

      Returns:
      FinancialsCalculation representing the defined calculation.

    • getFuturePayments

      public static FinancialsCalculation getFuturePayments()
      Deprecated.
      (since 10.0.1) Please use FinancialsCalculations.getFuturePayments() instead
      Returns a FinancialsCalculation representing Future Payments, i.e., Awaiting submission payments whose owning check's scheduled send date is after the current day.
      Returns:
      FinancialsCalculation representing the defined calculation.

    • getNetPayments

      public static FinancialsCalculation getNetPayments()
      Deprecated.
      (since 10.0.1) Please use FinancialsCalculations.getNetPayments() instead
      Returns a FinancialsCalculation representing Net Payments:

      Total Payments - Total Recoveries.

      Returns:
      FinancialsCalculation representing the defined calculation.

    • getTotalRecoveries

      public static FinancialsCalculation getTotalRecoveries()
      Deprecated.
      (since 10.0.1) Please use FinancialsCalculations.getTotalRecoveries() instead
      Returns a FinancialsCalculationRecoveryCategory representing Total Recoveries, which is all submitted recoveries. The return type of FinancialsCalculation allows for the calculation to optionally be limited to a specific RecoveryCategory.
      Returns:
      FinancialsCalculation representing the defined calculation.

    • getTotalIncurredGross

      public static FinancialsCalculation getTotalIncurredGross()
      Deprecated.
      (since 10.0.1) Please use FinancialsCalculations.getTotalIncurredGross() instead
      Returns a FinancialsCalculation representing Gross Total Incurred:

      Open Reserves + Total Payments.

      Returns:
      FinancialsCalculation representing the defined calculation.

    • getTotalIncurredNet

      public static FinancialsCalculation getTotalIncurredNet()
      Deprecated.
      (since 10.0.1) Please use FinancialsCalculations.getTotalIncurredNet() instead
      Returns a FinancialsCalculation representing Net Total Incurred:

      (Open Reserves + Total Payments)
      -
      Total Recoveries.

      Returns:
      FinancialsCalculation representing the defined calculation.

    • getTotalIncurredNetMinusOpenRecoveryReserves

      public static FinancialsCalculation getTotalIncurredNetMinusOpenRecoveryReserves()
      Deprecated.
      (since 10.0.1) Please use FinancialsCalculations.getTotalIncurredNetMinusOpenRecoveryReserves() instead
      Returns a FinancialsCalculation representing Net Total Incurred Minus Open Recovery Reserves (Total Incurred Gross minus Total Recovery Reserves):

      (Open Reserves + Total Payments)
      -
      Total Recovery Reserves.

      Returns:
      FinancialsCalculation representing the defined calculation.

    • getOpenRecoveryReserves

      public static FinancialsCalculation getOpenRecoveryReserves()
      Deprecated.
      (since 10.0.1) Please use FinancialsCalculations.getOpenRecoveryReserves() instead
      Returns a FinancialsCalculation representing Open Recovery Reserves:

      Submitted recovery reserves
      -
      Submitted recoveries.

      Returns:
      FinancialsCalculation representing the defined calculation.

    • getTotalPaymentsExpression

      public static FinancialsExpression getTotalPaymentsExpression()
      Getter for the 'Total Payments' financials expression, which can then be used to create a custom calculation.
      Returns:
      a FinancialsExpression representing Total Payments that can be used to build a custom expression for a custom FinancialsCalculation

    • getPendingApprovalPaymentsExpression

      public static FinancialsExpression getPendingApprovalPaymentsExpression()
      Getter for the 'Pending-approval Payments' financials expression, which can then be used to create a custom calculation.
      Returns:
      a FinancialsExpression representing all Pending-approval Payments (eroding and non-eroding) that can be used to build a custom expression for a custom FinancialsCalculation

    • getTotalPaymentsIncludingPendingExpression

      public static FinancialsExpression getTotalPaymentsIncludingPendingExpression()
      Getter for the 'Total Payments including Pending' financials expression, which can then be used to create a custom calculation.
      Returns:
      a FinancialsExpression representing Total Payments plus Future Payments plus Pending Approval Payments that can be used to build a custom expression for a custom FinancialsCalculation

    • getTotalReservesWithPendingExpression

      public static FinancialsExpression getTotalReservesWithPendingExpression()
      Getter for the 'Total Reserves with Pending' financials expression, which can then be used to create a custom calculation.
      Returns:
      a FinancialsExpression representing Total Reserves plus Future Reserves plus Pending Approval Reserves that can be used to build a custom expression for a custom FinancialsCalculation

    • getForeignExchangeAdjustmentsExpression

      public static FinancialsExpression getForeignExchangeAdjustmentsExpression()
      Getter for the 'Foreign Exchange Adjustments' financials expression, which can then be used to create a custom calculation.
      Returns:
      a FinancialsExpression representing the total foreign exchange adjustments for both eroding and non-eroding payments that can be used to build a custom expression for a custom FinancialsCalculation

    • getErodingPaymentsForeignExchangeAdjustmentsExpression

      public static FinancialsExpression getErodingPaymentsForeignExchangeAdjustmentsExpression()
      Getter for the 'Eroding Foreign Exchange Adjustments' financials expression, which can then be used to create a custom calculation.
      Returns:
      a FinancialsExpression representing the total foreign exchange adjustments for only payments that erode reserves, which can be used to build a custom expression for a custom FinancialsCalculation

    • getNonErodingPaymentsForeignExchangeAdjustmentsExpression

      public static FinancialsExpression getNonErodingPaymentsForeignExchangeAdjustmentsExpression()
      Getter for the 'Non-eroding Foreign Exchange Adjustments' financials expression, which can then be used to create a custom calculation.
      Returns:
      a FinancialsExpression representing the total foreign exchange adjustments for only payments that do not erode reserves, which can be used to build a custom expression for a custom FinancialsCalculation

    • getFinancialsCalculation

      public static FinancialsCalculation getFinancialsCalculation(FinancialsExpression expression)
      Deprecated.
      (since 10.0.1) Please use FinancialsCalculations.getFinancialsCalculation(FinancialsExpression expression) instead
      Gets a FinancialsCalculation for an arbitrary FinancialsExpression. This expression may be a composite expression, i.e. it may consist of multiple financial expressions combined with .plus( ) and/or .minus( )
      Parameters:
      expression - the FinancialsExpression to be encapulated by this calculation.
      Returns:
      a FinancialsCalculation for getting the calculated value represented by the provided FinancialsExpression

    • getRIFinancialsCalculation

      public static RIFinancialsCalculation getRIFinancialsCalculation(FinancialsExpression expression)
      Deprecated.
      (since 10.0.1) Please use FinancialsCalculations.getRIFinancialsCalculation(FinancialsExpression expression) instead
      Get expression as a RIFinancialsCalculation.
      Parameters:
      expression - the FinancialsExpression to be encapulated by this calculation.
      Returns:
      an RIFinancialsCalculation for getting the calculated value represented by the provided FinancialsExpression

    • getOpenRecoveryReservesForTransaction

      public static CurrencyAmount getOpenRecoveryReservesForTransaction(Transaction t)
      Returns the total amount of open recovery reserves for this transaction's Claim, Exposure, CostType and CostCategory.
      Parameters:
      t - The Transaction whose Claim, Exposure, CostType and CostCategory should be matched for the calculated amount.
      Returns:
      BigDecimal containing the current open recovery reserves, or null if the transaction is null
